entry.content:
ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨æ€ã„ã¤ã„ã¦ WHO COVID-2019 ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ä½œã£ã¦ã¿ãŸã€‚

  • spiegel-im-spiegel/cov19data: Importing WHO COVID-2019 Cases Global Data

ã‚ãã™ã£ã½ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚‚ã—ã¦ãªã„ãŒï¼Œæ±ç”¨ã§ä½¿ãˆã‚‹ã¨ã‚‚æ€ãˆãªã„ã—ï¼Œã¾ãã„ã„ã ã‚ã†ã€‚

â€œWHO Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Dashboardâ€ ã§å…¬é–‹ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ CSV ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å–ã£ã¦ãã‚‹ã ã‘ã®ç°¡å˜ãªãŠä»•äº‹ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚

ãã‚Œã ã‘ã§ã¯ãƒŠãƒ‹ãªã®ã§ï¼Œç°¡å˜ãªé›†è¨ˆã‚‚ã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ãŸã€‚ ãŸã¨ãˆã°

package main

import (
    "bytes"
    "fmt"
    "io"
    "os"
    "time"

    "github.com/spiegel-im-spiegel/cov19data"
    "github.com/spiegel-im-spiegel/cov19data/client"
    "github.com/spiegel-im-spiegel/cov19data/entity"
    "github.com/spiegel-im-spiegel/cov19data/histogram"
    "github.com/spiegel-im-spiegel/cov19data/values"
)

func main() {
    h, err := cov19data.MakeHistogramWHO(
        client.Default(),
        values.NewPeriod(
            values.NewDate(2020, time.Month(8), 1),
            values.Yesterday(),
        ),
        7, //step by 7 days
        entity.WithCountryCode(values.CC_JP),
        entity.WithRegionCode(values.WPRO),
    )
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Printf("%+v\n", err)
        return
    }

    b, err := histogram.ExportHistCSV(h)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Printf("%+v\n", err)
        return
    }
    if _, err := io.Copy(os.Stdout, bytes.NewReader(b)); err != nil {
        fmt.Println()
    }
    // Output:
    // Date_from,Date_to,Cases,Deaths
    // 2020-07-28,2020-08-03,8698,16
    // 2020-08-04,2020-08-10,9303,35
    // 2020-08-11,2020-08-17,7677,52
    // 2020-08-18,2020-08-24,6840,82
    // 2020-08-25,2020-08-31,5358,98
    // 2020-09-01,2020-09-07,3991,84
}

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"time"
)

func main() {
	year2000 := time.Date(2000, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, time.UTC)
	year3000 := time.Date(3000, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, time.UTC)

	fmt.Printf("year3000.After(year2000) = %v\n", year3000.After(year2000))
	fmt.Printf("year3000.Before(year2000) = %v\n", year3000.Before(year2000))
	fmt.Printf("year2000.After(year3000) = %v\n", year2000.After(year3000))
	fmt.Printf("year2000.Before(year3000) = %v\n", year2000.Before(year3000))

}

type Era struct {

var (

	eraList = []Era{
		{Name: "ä»¤å’Œ", Start: time.Date(2019, time.May, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, jst)},
		{Name: "å¹³æˆ", Start: time.Date(1989, time.January, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, jst)},
		{Name: "æ˜­å’Œ", Start: time.Date(1926, time.December, 25, 0, 0, 0, 0, jst)},
		{Name: "å¤§æ­£", Start: time.Date(1912, time.July, 30, 0, 0, 0, 0, jst)},
	}

ã“ã® eraList ã‚’æ™‚åˆ»ã®æ˜‡é †ã§ä¸¦ã¹æ›¿ãˆã¦ã¿ã‚‹ã€‚ ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã‹ãªã€‚

func (e Era) String() string {
	return fmt.Sprintf("%s (from %s)", e.Name, e.Start.Format("2006-01-02"))
}

func main() {
	fmt.Println(eraList)

	sort.Slice(eraList, func(i, j int) bool {
		return eraList[i].Start.Before(eraList[j].Start)

}
